COMMENT_TX: $Matt Holliday threw his body at Marco Scutaro at 2B; Holliday did not seem to touch the ground until after he passed the bag; he hit Scutaro on the lower legs with his body; Scutaro was hurt but stayed in the game
$Marco Scutaro delivered the game-deciding hit after being hurt in the first inning by Matt Holliday; Holliday misplayed the ball in LF, allowing a third run to score
Giants second baseman Marco Scutaro left the game due to an injured leg

$John Jay made a diving catch in RCF; Gregor Blanco had rounded 2B and had to retouch on the way back to 1B; the throw in from Jay was wide of the bag; Allen Craig lunged at Blanco and seemed to tag him; Blanco was called safe by 1B umpire Bill Miller; the Cardinals disputed the ruling; the umpires briefly huddled but did not change the call
Cardinals right fielder Carlos Beltran left the game due to a strained left knee
$Lance Lynn's throw to 2B hit the bag and bounced into short right center field
$Brandon Belt's grounder took a high hop and hit the diving Daniel Descalso on the right side of his face
$Hunter Pence's bat broke on contact and struck the ball three times in the hitting zone
